channel.title: Hey i got a problem with the portals and thieveing tables. Easy fix. I hope
channel.description:
Allright I got my server up and running, people can join and play. But, when ever you go through say a "main portal room area" portal all the portals in there dissapear and then reapear like 2 min later. Any help? And sometimes who you login the portals and stuff arnt in there and the thieving tables are gone how do i fix?
And also when you log in sometimes nothing shows up... then when you re-log and then log back it it works... any help?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 30, 2008, 04:27:55 PM[/size][hr]No one knows how to help me? Come on please. Ill give you easy Rep ++ if you can help me. I just need a good coder who knows how to fix this.

item.title: Hey i got a problem with the portals and thieveing tables. Easy fix. I hope
item.dc:creator: @OMG_its_NICK OMG its NICK
item.description:
@OMG_its_NICK wrote:

Allright I got my server up and running, people can join and play. But, when ever you go through say a “main portal room area” portal all the portals in there dissapear and then reapear like 2 min later. Any help? And sometimes who you login the portals and stuff arnt in there and the thieving tables are gone how do i fix?

And also when you log in sometimes nothing shows up… then when you re-log and then log back it it works… any help?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 30, 2008, 04:27:55 PM[/size][hr]No one knows how to help me? Come on please. Ill give you easy Rep ++ if you can help me. I just need a good coder who knows how to fix this.
